## 

```{r, results='asis'}
library(conllr)
library(tidyverse)
kpv <- read_conll('~/langdoc/kpv-gold/kpv-ud.conllu')

kpv %>% 
  mutate(id = stringr::str_trim(id)) %>%
  filter(id == 'belyx-011.000') %>%
  as_conllu_div() -> kpv_1
kpv_1
```
